newsitem.title: USA: EMB reports sharp rise in originations.
newsitem.headline: EMB reports sharp rise in originations.

text.p: EMB Corp said loan originations for the first six months of 1997 surged to $144,593,864 compared to $18,148,310 in the first six months of 1996, an increase of 696.7 percent.
Loan fundings rose 654.5 percent to $61,369,370 in the first two quarters of 1997 compared to $8,134,154 in 1996.
Loan originations for June totaled $31,935,526 virtually equalling the month of May. Loan fundings for June equaled $16,423,420 versus $13,935,600 in May, up 18 percent.
"We are pleased with these results and look forward to their being reflected in sustained increases in earnings and revenues," said Bruce Brosky, vice president of EMB Corp.
